title: Little Guardian of Freedom | Republic Day Portrait
prompt:
Use the uploaded photo as the only and exact facial reference. STRICT FACE LOCK is mandatory. Keep the child's face 100% identical with no changes to facial structure, features, skin tone, age, expression, or natural skin texture. Preserve realistic proportions, pores, and authentic human details. No beautification, no smoothing, no AI facial alteration of any kind.

ASPECT RATIO:
3:4 vertical

SCENE & SUBJECT:
Create an ultra-realistic 4K HD cinematic patriotic portrait of a young Indian child standing confidently in a lush green open field during golden hour. The child is holding the Indian national flag high with both hands. The tricolor fabric flows naturally in the wind with accurate saffron, white, and green colors. The Ashoka Chakra must be sharp, centered, and clearly visible.

POSE & EXPRESSION:
Strong yet innocent posture. Calm, confident, and proud expression. The pose should feel emotional, inspirational, and heroic while remaining natural for a child.

OUTFIT DETAILS:
Simple traditional white kurta-pyjama with realistic fabric texture and natural folds. Clean, authentic Indian styling.

BACKGROUND & ENVIRONMENT:
Lush green field with soft depth of field. Dramatic yet peaceful sky with warm golden-hour tones. White doves flying gently around the child to symbolize peace and freedom. Add a subtle circular Ashoka Chakra light glow behind the subject, soft and elegant, enhancing the heroic Republic Day mood without overpowering the scene.

LIGHTING & CAMERA:
Warm golden-hour sunlight with soft highlights and realistic shadows. Professional DSLR photography look. Cinematic color grading, shallow background blur, high dynamic range, and crystal-clear details. The face must remain perfectly sharp.

OUTPUT & STYLE:
Ultra-realistic 4K HD quality. Premium cinematic photography style. Emotional, powerful, and inspirational Republic Day atmosphere with natural colors and lifelike realism.

NEGATIVE PROMPT:
Cartoon, anime, CGI, illustration, AI-generated face, face change, blur, low resolution, over-smoothed skin, plastic skin, distortion, extra fingers, bad anatomy, harsh shadows, dull colors, watermark (except signature), logo, text clutter.

title: Together for the Tiranga | Republic Day Couple Portrait
prompt:
Create a cinematic double exposure Republic Day poster featuring a couple. Use the same two people consistently across the composition. Faces should remain natural and realistic, with no artificial reshaping or beauty filters. Preserve real skin texture, expressions, and identity.

COMPOSITION:
Double exposure layout with layered portraits of the couple.

BACKGROUND (FIRST EXPOSURE):
Very large, soft, faded background faces of the couple placed artistically behind the main subjects. Apply heavy Gaussian blur, low contrast, and a dreamy effect at around 15–20% opacity. The background faces should feel emotional and symbolic, not sharp.

BACKGROUND COLORS:
Misty Indian tricolor blend flowing across the background: saffron hues at the top, soft white fog/mist in the middle, and green tones at the bottom. Smooth, cinematic blending.

FOREGROUND (SECOND EXPOSURE):
A sharp, ultra-clear foreground portrait of the couple in a confident yet calm pose. Natural, realistic skin texture, gentle patriotic expressions, and strong emotional presence. DSLR-level sharpness with shallow depth of field.

OUTFIT DETAILS:
White traditional-modern outfits for both individuals. Clean, elegant styling with subtle ethnic touches. Minimal jewelry and accessories only, refined and understated.

MOOD & EXPRESSION:
Calm, proud, patriotic, and emotionally connected. A sense of unity, togetherness, and respect for the nation.

TEXT ELEMENTS:
Add bold condensed text reading:
"HAPPY REPUBLIC DAY" or "REPUBLIC DAY" in Indian tricolor colors.
Place the text neatly at the bottom or center. Optionally add a small italic patriotic quote beneath it in white.

LIGHTING & STYLE:
Soft cinematic lighting with realistic shadows and highlights. DSLR-like photorealistic quality, cinematic color grading, emotional and inspirational Republic Day poster aesthetic.
